title: 关于物品名称指令的问题
author: Plants-Stars
txt_content: 我使用这条指令：/give @s fishing_rod{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Text\",\"italic\":\"false\",\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"bold\":\"true\"}",Lore:['{"text":"???","color":"dark_red","bold":"true","obfuscated":"true","italic":"false"}','{"text":"Sword","color":"dark_red","bold":"true","italic":"false"}']}}之后，会出现3排名称，可我想让后两排在一行上，并且一个乱码，一个正常，不适用§的情况下，请问怎么更改才可以？

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-7-15 19:52 编辑 

我错了，我用NBTExplore弄了半天，确实可以

/give @s fishing_rod{display:{Name: '{"text":"???","color":"dark_red","bold":"true","extra":[{"text":"123","obfuscated":"true"}]}'}}

那最后改好的效果就是

/give @s fishing_rod{display:{Name: '{"text":"???","italic":"false","color":"dark_red","obfuscated":"true","bold":"true","extra":[{"text":"Sword","obfuscated":"false"}]}',Lore:['{"text":"Text","italic":"false","color":"dark_red","bold":"true"}']}}

好了这样对了
